name: Endless Corridor
description:
Run or die! Small horror-themed endless runner by a group of Taitotalo gamedev students. Goal is simple: Try to survive as long as you can while dodging whatever comes your way in this cursed manor. But beware! your light only lasts so long, so remember to collect lamp oil to keep your torch lit!

Controls:

  • A/D or Arrows to move sideways
